downloadTitle: MVP Session 16: Build and apply reports from shape data in Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Watch a brief demonstration of how to extract and present shape data as reports in Visio 2010.
detailsSection:
Learn how to extract and present shape data as reports in Microsoft Visio 2010. This video introduces reports, such as a shape inventory for a circuit diagram or an asset report for a space plan diagram. It shows that Visio can automatically build a web page report or embed report information as a dynamic shape right in the diagram. It also covers how to easily create your own custom reports.
This video is part of a series covering the basics of how to use Visio features and capabilities. Visit http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions to learn more and view other videos in this series.
installInstructionSection: The video has two downloadable resolution: 1000k/lowest and 8000k/highest. Click Download to save the video to your computer.
